trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> objects which persist in a Windows Address Book.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una raccolta di <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> gli oggetti che vengono mantenute in una Rubrica di Windows.

trans-unit.source: This class has no public constructors, since a reference to it is returned by the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration> class.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non ha alcun costruttore pubblico, poiché restituisce un riferimento a tale <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration>classe.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration>

trans-unit.source: Address books that are associated with <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> management include those associated with the host peer and a remote peer.
trans-unit.target: Le rubriche associati <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>management includono quelle associate al peer host e un peer remoto.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>

trans-unit.source: Either computer may collaborate with other peers; when a peer is local to the remote peer but not the host peer, it can be added to the ContactManager of the host peer.
trans-unit.target: Entrambi i computer possono collaborare con gli altri peer. Quando un peer locale per il peer remoto ma non il peer di host, può essere aggiunto a ContactManager del peer host.

trans-unit.source: Certain operations on the ContactManager class, such as <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.AddContact%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.DeleteContact%2A>, correlate to the associated operations being performed on the Windows Address book of the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: Classe di determinate operazioni su ContactManager, ad esempio <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.AddContact%2A>e <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.DeleteContact%2A>, sono correlate alle operazioni eseguite nella Rubrica di Windows del peer remoto associate.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.DeleteContact%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.AddContact%2A>

trans-unit.source: The host peer has access to this persistent storage for <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> information, which can be associated with the applications in which a peer intends to participate.
trans-unit.target: Il peer host può accedere a questo archivio persistente per <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>informazioni che possono essere associate alle applicazioni in cui un peer intende partecipare.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication> can identify itself as a user of a ContactManager persistent store on a computer.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication>identificare se stesso come un utente di un archivio persistente ContactManager in un computer.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication>

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref> of the local peer.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> per la <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref> del peer locale.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare questo metodo richiede un <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> instance to add to <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> istanza da aggiungere al <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified by peerContact already exists.
trans-unit.target: La specificato da peerContact esiste già.

trans-unit.source: peerContact is .
trans-unit.target: peerContactis .

trans-unit.source: The specified peerContact has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Specificato peerContact è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: - The specified by peerContact could not be reconstituted from its serialized XML format.
trans-unit.target: -Il specificato da peerContact potrebbe non essere ricostituito dal formato XML serializzato.

trans-unit.source: - Unable to add the local peer to the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref> instance being constructed.
trans-unit.target: -Impossibile aggiungere il peer locale per la <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref> istanza viene costruito.

trans-unit.source: Raised whenever a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> associated with a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref> has changed.
trans-unit.target: Generato ogni volta che un <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> associata a un <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> nel <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref> è stato modificato.

trans-unit.source: This method only returns applications published by contacts of the calling peer.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo restituisce solo le applicazioni pubblicate dal contatti del peer chiamante.

trans-unit.source: Before this event can be raised, the current user of the remote peer must subscribe to the collaboration events of the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: Prima di questo evento può essere generato, l'utente corrente del peer remoto deve eseguire la sottoscrizione agli eventi di collaborazione del peer remoto.

trans-unit.source: Subscription is accomplished via the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: La sottoscrizione viene eseguita tramite il <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo richiede che un <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: The calling object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: È stato eliminato l'oggetto chiamante.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> instance for the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Crea un <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> istanza per l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare questo metodo richiede un <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> to associate with the new <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> da associare il nuovo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> instance for the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> istanza per l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: peerNearMe is .
trans-unit.target: peerNearMeis .

trans-unit.source: This <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Questo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> oggetto è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: - The contact manager of the remote peer passed in peerNearMe could not be reached, or the contact could not be read from it.
trans-unit.target: -Gestione contatti del peer remoto passato peerNearMe non può essere raggiunto, oppure non è stato possibile leggere il contatto da esso.

trans-unit.source: - The instance passed in peerNearMe has no endpoints set on it.
trans-unit.target: -La istanza passata peerNearMe non è impostato alcun endpoint.

trans-unit.source: Creates a contact instance for the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Crea un'istanza di contatto per l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare questo metodo richiede un <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> to associate with the new <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> da associare il nuovo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: A user-defined <xref:System.Object> that contains information about the CreateContactAsync operation.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto definito dall'utente <xref:System.Object>che contiene informazioni sull'operazione CreateContactAsync.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: It will be passed to the callback of the asynchronous operation for identification.
trans-unit.target: Verrà passato al callback dell'operazione asincrona per l'identificazione.

trans-unit.source: userToken already exists and is in use.
trans-unit.target: userTokenesiste già ed è in uso.

trans-unit.source: peerNearMe is .
trans-unit.target: peerNearMeis .

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> oggetto è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: - The specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance has no endpoints set on it.
trans-unit.target: -Specificato <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> istanza non ha impostato alcun endpoint.

trans-unit.source: Raised whenever a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.CreateContact*> method has completed.
trans-unit.target: Generato ogni volta che un <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.CreateContact*>completamento del metodo.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.CreateContact*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.CreateContactAsync%2A> method has completed.
trans-unit.target: Questo evento viene generato quando il <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.CreateContactAsync%2A>completamento del metodo.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.CreateContactAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is also raised if the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager> operation completes in error or is cancelled.
trans-unit.target: Viene generato anche se il <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>operazione completata con errori o è stata annullata.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>

trans-unit.source: This event requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo richiede che un <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: The calling object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: È stato eliminato l'oggetto chiamante.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref> of the local peer.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> dal <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref> del peer locale.

trans-unit.target: peerContactis .

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> associated with the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName*> from the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref> of the local peer.

trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName*>associato il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> per rimuovere il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName*>

trans-unit.target: peerNameis .

trans-unit.source: This object has had <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.Dispose*> previously called on it and cannot be used for future operations.
trans-unit.target: Questo oggetto è stato <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.Dispose*>richiamato su di essa in precedenza e non può essere utilizzato per operazioni future.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.Dispose*>

trans-unit.target: Impossibile completare <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.DeleteContact*>operazione.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.DeleteContact*>

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia tutte le risorse usate dal <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> object for the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName*>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> oggetto per lo specificato <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName*>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName*>

trans-unit.source: - Contact not found in <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: -Contatto non trovato <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: - Unable to obtain the contact for the supplied <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName*>.
trans-unit.target: -Impossibile ottenere il contatto per fornito <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName*>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContactCollection"></xref> that contains all contacts within the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref> of the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContactCollection"> </xref> che contiene tutti i contatti all'interno di <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref> del peer remoto.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare questo metodo richiede un <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContactCollection"></xref> that contains all contacts within the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref> of the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContactCollection"></xref>che contiene tutti i contatti all'interno di <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref> del peer remoto.

trans-unit.source: If the contact manager is empty, then a collection of size zero (0) is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se la gestione di contatto è vuota, viene restituito un insieme di dimensioni zero (0).

trans-unit.source: This <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Questo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref> oggetto è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: An invalid value was returned when this method attempted to enumerate a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"></xref> in this peer contact collection.
trans-unit.target: È stato restituito un valore non valido durante un tentativo di questo metodo enumerare un <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"> </xref> peer all'insieme di contatti.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> representing the local peer.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> che rappresenta il peer locale.

trans-unit.source: Unless specified, the default value for this property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se non diversamente specificato, il valore predefinito per questa proprietà è `null`.

trans-unit.source: Using this property requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzo di questa proprietà richiede un <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> instance representing the local peer.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> istanza che rappresenta il peer locale.

trans-unit.source: Raised whenever the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName*> associated with a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref> has changed.
trans-unit.target: Generato ogni volta che il <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName*>associata a un <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> nel <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref> è stata modificata.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName*>

trans-unit.source: The associated callback provides a reference to the new <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il callback associato fornisce un riferimento al nuovo <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName%2A>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo richiede che un <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: The calling object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: È stato eliminato l'oggetto chiamante.

trans-unit.source: Raised whenever an object within a contact’s registered <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> objects has changed.
trans-unit.target: Generato ogni volta che un oggetto all'interno di un contatto registrato <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> oggetti è stato modificato.

trans-unit.source: Before this event can be raised, the current user of the remote peer must subscribe to the collaboration events of the host peer.
trans-unit.target: Prima di questo evento può essere generato, l'utente corrente del peer remoto deve eseguire la sottoscrizione agli eventi di collaborazione del peer host.

trans-unit.source: Subscription is accomplished via the PeerContact <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: La sottoscrizione viene eseguita tramite la PeerContact <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo richiede che un <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> oggetto è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: Raised whenever the presence status of a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref> has changed.
trans-unit.target: Generato ogni volta che lo stato di presenza di un <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> nel <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref> è stato modificato.

trans-unit.source: Before this event can be raised, the current user of the remote peer must subscribe to the collaboration events of the host peer.
trans-unit.target: Prima di questo evento può essere generato, l'utente corrente del peer remoto deve eseguire la sottoscrizione agli eventi di collaborazione del peer host.

trans-unit.source: Subscription is accomplished via the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: La sottoscrizione viene eseguita tramite il <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo richiede che un <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> oggetto è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the list of subscribed contacts changes.
trans-unit.target: Generato quando viene modificato l'elenco dei contatti sottoscritti.

trans-unit.source: Since subscriptions are per user and not per process or per application domain, another application running on the host may also cause this event to be raised.
trans-unit.target: Poiché le sottoscrizioni sono per utente e non per processo o per dominio applicazione, un'altra applicazione in esecuzione nell'host può causare la generazione dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: This event requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo richiede che un <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: When this property value is set, all events not fired as the result of an asynchronous operation will have the associated event handlers called back on the thread that created the specific <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.SynchronizingObject*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando il valore della proprietà è impostato, tutti gli eventi non viene generati come risultato di un'operazione asincrona avrà i gestori eventi richiamati sul thread che ha creato la specifica <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.SynchronizingObject*>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.SynchronizingObject*>

trans-unit.source: The default set value for this property is `null`, indicating that all event handlers are called on a system thread pool thread.
trans-unit.target: Il valore del set predefinito di questa proprietà è `null`, che indica che tutti i gestori eventi vengono chiamati in un thread di pool di thread di sistema.

trans-unit.source: This property is typically set to a UI element such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> instance.
trans-unit.target: Impostare questa proprietà viene in genere un elemento dell'interfaccia utente, ad esempio un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>istanza.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: Object that implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke"></xref> interface and is used by instances of this type for event handler synchronization on the thread that created it.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che implementa il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke"> </xref> l'interfaccia e viene utilizzato dalle istanze di questo tipo per la sincronizzazione dei gestori di eventi sul thread che li ha creati.

trans-unit.source: The calling object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: È stato eliminato l'oggetto chiamante.

trans-unit.source: Updates the data associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Aggiorna i dati associati con la <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare questo metodo richiede un <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> to be updated.
trans-unit.target: La <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> da aggiornare.

trans-unit.source: - <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> not found in <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref>non è stato trovato <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: peerContactis .

trans-unit.target: Questo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> oggetto è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: Unable to complete UpdateContact operation.
trans-unit.target: Impossibile completare l'operazione UpdateContact.
